Name: Mr Meal
About the game: Become a secret agent Complete most diverse missions: keep away from robots and solve logic puzzles as a newly employed secret agent. Who is Mr Meal? What is he up to? {STEAM_APP_IMAGE}/extras/becomeSecretAgent.png Live in the base Agency headquarters - this is where you live and prepare for your missions. Here you can meet other individuals and hear their stories. Explore and discover the secrets. Explore the world Wander into three nearby towns. Check the sewers and find out what is hidden underground and in the mountains. And that mysterious abandoned town... Be a part of community Meeting people on your way will let you hear their stories and uncover the secrets. You can possibly cross paths with Mr Meals's staff. Be yourself Make doalogue choices. Collect outfits, and dress as you like. The game is mostly based on dialogues and puzzle-arcade missions. There are also mini-games both as part of the main storyline and side activities. ------------------------------------------- Game playtime You can complete the first and the second chapters in about 4 hours. The 3rd chapter is still to come. Additional information This game contains flashing images that may make it unsuitable for people with photosensitive epilepsy or other photosensitive disorders. Please take caution.
